title: split_modalities
description: Split the modalities from a single .h5mu multimodal sample into seperate .h5mu files.

output.description: Output directory containing multiple h5mu files.
output.help_text: Type: `file`, multiple: `False`, required, default: `"$id.$key.output"`, direction: `output`, example: `"/path/to/output"`.

output_types.description: A csv containing the base filename and modality type per output file.
output_types.help_text: Type: `file`, multiple: `False`, required, default: `"$id.$key.output_types.csv"`, direction: `output`, example: `"types.csv"`.

output_compression.description:
Compression format to use for the output AnnData and/or Mudata objects.
By default no compression is applied.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.
